# <:Exe:1313802138874417152>   Media Applications Are Open Now.

<:Admin:1275855755475423355> **Requirements**
- Media Rank - 300 Subscribers, 150 Average Views 
- Smol Rank - 150 Subscribers, 70-100  Average Views 
- Must have real subscribers/views, should not be bought 
- Must have a good reputation
- Must upload at least `1 Video`
- You must be active 

<:FB_fichado_1270733241925501009:1309028511809273918>  To Apply make a ticket <#1255377855131680792> 

Good Luck 🤞
